titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Jackie Weisberg's Gowanus Impressions photographs 2011.008
titlestmt.author: Maggie Schreiner. Digital files processed by Erica LÃ³pez in 2019.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:19:13 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: This collection includes 27 digital photographs and two archival inkjet prints by Jackie Weisberg depicting the neighborhood of Gowanus.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research without restriction.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: These photographs remain under copyright. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions. Contact CBH for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Jackie Weisberg's Gowanus Impressions photographs, 2011.008, Box and Folder number; Center for Brooklyn History, Brooklyn Public Library.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Access to digital materials is avaialble onsite at the Othmer Library. Request to access born digital materials must be made at least 2 days in advance by emailing library@brooklynhistory.org
